sub_title: Group Support Director EMEA | People Leader Supporting My People ALWAYS | Leading Global & Regional On prem, Cloud SAAS Teams | Scaling Front End to Technical Back End Support Teams | Elevating Customer Experience
summary:
Strong experience in all facets of building and managing regional & global 24x7 support teams that focuses on maintenance / development releases, account management, troubleshooting, installations, configurations for various enterprise/SMB/cloud SAAS operations,hardware & software with the ability to communicate complex technical information at all business levels for customers, solution partners, etc. 

My 19 years background covers Telecommunication, IT, Fintech and Customer Service industries with focus on managing product software support / Level 3 development & working with a cross functional & global teams. Have sound ability to effectively manage & lead teams of muli-cultural engineers and managers to achieving record-high customer satisfaction / net promoter score rankings. Deep exposure in the following:

-Managing customer support front line, junior & senior engineers(technical Level 2/3)
-Managing & building 1st and 2nd line tenured leaders
-Managing support operation budgets
-Developing & growing talent (regional/global)
-Rolling out new product support offerings
-Hiring, onboarding & team development (setting up new sites. teams, mentoring/growing leaders)
-Develop career framework process for increased retention 
-Supporting pre-sales/consultancy team efforts to deliver/sign off projects
-Supporting Sales Mission to identify potential customers based on cutting edge deployment / growth markets
-Assisting clients & business partners globally in defining issues & producing solutions
-Strong history of reviewing software systems to improve functionality & productivity,by actively identifying product serviceability opportunities/enhancements
-Coordinating & engaging with product development teams in quality reviews,beta testing & review testing of upgraded & new products
-Assisting with positioning customers to act as a “Reference”, for selling/demonstrating value of product portfolios
-Strategic operational focus for high performing teams with a focus on driving efficiencies

profile_positions.description: Head of EMEA Group - Owning and managing strategic direction of EMEA region across Europe & India, helping develop & scale product support operations for multi-site support while leading multiple senior leaders. Continuous focus on people growth & pushing boundaries for legendary customer experience
profile_positions.title: Group Support Manager EMEA - Cloud SAAS Teams

profile_positions.description:
Global product lead - Driving improvement in support operations across the global Atlassian Confluence Cloud & Atlassian Access product support teams along with scaling their processes. Also encompasses global program manager duties which includes program/project management across regional sites and also running cross-geo hiring and people development rituals across these deep technical cloud SAAS support teams.

Continually focused on driving big impacts to the business and customers. Driving multi-quarter project delivery, growing teams, managing & onboarding new leaders/group managers, and covering risk remediation across cross-functional business teams.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Product Lead - Cloud Services

profile_positions.description: Head of APAC Cloud - Owning and managing Asia Pacific cloud product support operations in Malaysia and Australia, driving APAC strategy, capacity & resource planning, hiring and driving development and managing of people managers and engineers
profile_positions.title: Regional Manager (APAC) - Cloud Services

profile_positions.description: Asia Pacific Manager for managing deep technical support leads/engineers for Atlassian Cloud product portfolios with teams based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Sydney, Australia. APAC support operational ownership, people management and development, product team partnerships, hiring, scaling & standardizing hyper growth while enabling peak customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Asia Pacific Senior Manager - Cloud Services

profile_positions.description: Head of customer facing, tehnical support operations, software maintenance & development teams for subscription payment gateways for the ANZ / ASEAN regions. Covering multi-site teams across KL & Sydney offices. Key focus towards people development, standardizing operational efficiency and planning for coverage within new targeted markets for growth.
profile_positions.title: Director of Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
APAC management head for managing deep technical support operations for Atlassian product portfolios with teams based in Kuala-lumpur, Malaysia and Sydney, Australia.

With Focus on:
-Covering technical product support for new implementations & existing APAC customers (including critical & customer escalations out of GEO customers in EMEA/Americas)
-Manage new & ongoing projects with Service Enablement Teams to reduce customer friction. 
-Focal point for the APAC technical support teams while bridging product bugs issues, enhancements inclusion into future releases, and product patch issues & documentation gaps with product development teams. 
-Manage/review junior&senior engineers'​ problem resolution/client communication 
-Manage team resource allocation, perform reviews & mentor/guide team members. 
-Assist with seniors and potential team leads' skill development, enablement
-Work with recruitment teams covering interview process, assessments and streamlining to find the best possible candidates for our growing teams
-Manage product portfolios key KPIs to ensure effective customer responsiveness, no client DSAT with focus driving Net Promoter Scores trends upwards
-Assist remote teams/managers
-Plan, assess and determine operational objectives, improvement areas and results
profile_positions.title: Asia Pacific Support Manager

profile_positions.description:
APAC management lead for managing the technical support strategy of following product portfolios:
-IBM Netcool Configuration Manager (Configuration Management)
-IBM Business Service Manager (Dashboard health of critical business services/SLAs)
-IBM Smart Cloud Predictive Insights (Real-time performance analysis software for business services)
-IBM Dashboard Application Services Hub (UI console for administering IBM products and related applications)

With Focus on:
-Covering technical product support for new project implementations & existing AP clients.
-Manage new & ongoing projects with IBM service personnel, outsourced delivery specialists and business partners covering POC, UAT sign-off, & product implementation issues. 
-Manage key customer clients as IBM focal point for technical support while bridging product bugs issues, enhancements inclusion into future releases, and product patch issues & documentation gaps with Level 3/4 teams, QA teams & product development teams. 
-Manage/review junior&senior engineers' problem resolution/client communication 
-Manage team resource allocation, perform reviews & mentor/guide team members. 
-Assist with team leads' skill development, enablement & recruitment 
-Manage product portfolios key KPIs to ensure no client communication misses, no client DSAT with focus to increase solution turn around times and meet stipulated SLAs 
-Assist remote teams/managers 

Worked within the IBM Cloud & Smarter Infrastructure division.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lead - SWG Client Support, Cloud & Smarter Infrastructure

profile_positions.description:
Lead engineer with focus on managing key account SLAs for multiple product portfolios relating to banking and telco sector. Involved with hiring and setting up of global support center, where resources were migrated from Americas/EMEA region to APAC. 

Experience in managing workload distribution, and resource management within a large team of 40 members. Additionally, managed customer service operations for proprietary products covering large global multinationals in the Americas/EMEA/APAC regions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Pioneer support engineer of a new global support center where knowledge transfers was incurred from Americas/EMEA regions to raise profile and skill sets of newly set up APAC global support center. Assisted with developing new junior engineer skills sets and also contributed to providing deep technical support to Telecommunication Providers worldwide for proprietary network performance monitoring products for Wireless networks. End-to-end support covering products, databases, performance management and infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Global Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Providing technical assurance with focus on system and database administration for Windows & Unix application & business related servers. 

Key Duties were to manage the implementation of company wide email exchange server upgrades and maintenance. Managed and trained/assigned new hires covering Windows server management and user security. Also project managed vendors (hardware/software/outsourced services) extensively, such as coordinating the implementing of HP superdome for consolidation of servers for specified fixed line/mobile billing applications. Provided server/database administration for Timedotcom's billing environment and its related users. Incurred project planning for server expansion & managed ad-hoc patches/fixes.
profile_positions.title: Systems Engineer
